item.title: WHy you don't need to feel confident to be successful
item.description: Nothing kills confidence more than waiting to feel confident to do something. I used to be super focused on setting and achieving goals, at the expense of impacting my mental health and well-being, by being a perfectionist and setting high expectations of myself. Lately, learning how to be more present and resilient has become my priority. I’m done being a slave driver and beating myself up when things don’t work out as I want (or as I want and fear of success kicks in).
